mapper.select: select alarm_message_id from alarm_message where user_id = #{user_id} order by alarm_message_id desc limit 1
mapper.update: update alarm_message set alarm_message_is_new = 0, alarm_message_mod_date=now() where alarm_message_id = #{alarm_message_id}
mapper.select: select count(alarm_message_is_new)as alarm_message_count from alarm_message where user_id=#{user_id} and alarm_message_is_new=1;
